name: Princess Rainbowface
tagline: Game dedicated to a little girl who lost her younger brother.  If you would like to support the family you can donate here: https://www.gofundme.com/evwcfkkc  Any content donated must be usable for commercial purposes.
body:
Game dedicated to a little girl who lost her younger brother.  If you would like to support the family you can donate here: https://www.gofundme.com/evwcfkkc  

Any content donated must be usable for commercial purposes since it might be turned into a commercial game with profits going to the family.

For more information check out http://PrincessRainbowface.com and if you are interested in my game creation software http://SandboxGameMaker.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
